title: Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask, LC-dolida Sleeping Headphones for Side Sleepers Sleep Mask with Bluetooth Headphones Ultra-Thin Stereo Speakers Perfect for Sleeping
descriptions:
Introducing the Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask by LC-dolida. This innovative product combines the benefits of sleep headphones, a Bluetooth sleep mask, and a sleep eye mask, making it perfect for a comfortable and uninterrupted sleep experience.

The Sleep Headphones feature a Bluetooth version 5.2, ensuring a stable and seamless connection with most Bluetooth-enabled devices. With a wireless range of 45 feet, you can move around freely without worrying about losing the connection. The HD stereo sound quality provides a rich and immersive audio experience that will enhance your relaxation.

The battery life of the Sleep Headphones is impressive, offering 8-10 hours of playtime on a single charge. And with a quick charging time of 1-2 hours, you'll never have to wait long to enjoy your favorite music or soothing sounds.

Designed with your comfort in mind, the Sleep Headphones feature a contoured 3D ergonomic fit, adjustable strap, and zero pressure on the eyes. This makes it ideal for side sleepers who want to enjoy a peaceful slumber without any discomfort.

The Sleep Headphones are made from high-quality memory foam and soft fabric, providing a cool and comfortable experience. The breathable and hypoallergenic material ensures that you can wear it for long periods without any irritation or discomfort.

With its perfect light blockage, the Sleep Headphones create a completely dark environment, making it ideal for various situations. Whether you suffer from insomnia, frequently travel by air, practice meditation or yoga, experience migraines, or have dry eyes, this product will cater to your needs.

The Sleep Headphones also make for great gift ideas. Suitable for men, women, teens, girls, boys, dads, and moms, they can be gifted on occasions like Christmas, Valentine's Day, Halloween, Easter, birthdays, Mother's Day, Father's Day, and Teachers' Day.

Experience the ultimate sleep companion with the Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask by LC-dolida. Get yours today and enjoy a restful and rejuvenating sleep like never before.
